Great quality, beautiful pair of jeans but they run extremely small. My daughter wears a 7/8. The XL jeans fit her perfect. I generally wear a large or XL. I couldn't get the jeans over my hips.
Love those jeans 👖 the quality of the material so great and true size !! It takes forever to arrive but I love it

They are so cute, both pairs I tried on seemed great. My first order was the black XL, they were crazy cute but the waist was so baggy I could have fit a toddler in there. Returned them and had to get a blue, got an L, they are SO small, I can't even begin to button them. Such a bummer, it doesn't seem worth it to try a third time. :(

i was expecting baggy, but these are more like wide leg jeans. fit great from the waist, but are EXTREMELY LONG even when wearing 1 inch platforms (i'm 5'3 / 161cm). the material is good and has an elastic waist band, but the length fit is not great for average/short girls.

I would not buy these again and I'm going to try to return them because they were way to expensive for how awful they feel.
they fit how they should and fairly soft. pretty satisfied. just don't understand why "6-black" is just a dark wash. still a solid pair of jeans tho

They are sooo nice, but the only thing I would say it to get a size up. (I’m 5’2 and I got a Large) So they are very long but I like them like that!! The material is amazing they are 100% jeans. I’m gong to buy them in all the colors!
Adorable and clean fit. Can dress up or down.

Honestly i have like no jeans so these were super cute and they look like the picture, im 5'3 and im 115 lb im 13 and im typing this on my dads account but yeah super cute and i ordered a small but it was still longish so i rolled it up a little but got some compliments!!! wish i could show a picture on computer- :3
I ordered these because I liked the idea of purple jeans. I was pleasantly surprised. They seem well-made, fit great- there's elastic in the back of the waist so it's not too loose or too tight.
They are baggy and comfortable. I’ve washed them a few times and they never bleed or faded. They’re a little too low rise for me, but I still like them

The color is nice and it sits at a nice length. It is also the perfect amount of baggy. The elastic scrunched up waist is perfect as well.

These are really good! They fit well at my waist and give me the y2k look I was going for and their baggy at the bottom, the only thing is when they first arrived they were really stiff but after a wash they were okay!

Great Fit.  True to fit sizing.
Fit well. That's great baggy look great with platform boots. Don't drag on the ground.
liked it

I weigh about 118-120 and my height is around 5’5. I was a bit nervous about how they would look because the reviews are were very mixed. My normal waist size is 26 but I decided to choose a size medium and I’m glad I did because they fit great!

The medium on these jeans were a big medium.  These were for someone 5' 5" and the medium length went under the shoe. Same color as picture. This was more like a medium-large. Couldn't wear because they were too big. Thinner denim. Not classic jean material.

评论概述: Everything I had hoped they'd be!
评论详情: I'm 6 ft tall, 139 lbs, wearing a size Medium.  Would I Love for these to be an inch or two longer? Absolutely! But I can rock them at this length.  They're a nice medium weight denim and the color is a little richer purple than the product pics look on my computer.  Haven't figured out how to style them yet, but I Love them!

The sizing chart for this is wrong. I am 179lbs and ordered the 2X as listed but the pants are just way too big on me. It is already a loose-fitting jean, so not getting the correct size makes it look even more huge.  I would say maybe go down one or two sizes from what is listed. It is made from true jean material with minimum stretch to it. The legs are wide and very long in style. There is an elastic waist in the back area that bunches up to help the waist area, so if you get the correct size a belt won't be needed.

评论概述: Trust the size chart or size up 2 sizes from normal
评论详情: I'm usually a size L/XL so ordered the XL since that was the only option and I was hoping the elastic waist and baggy fit would make this workable.  Nope.  It fits like a medium would on me.  Sausage jeans that instantly fan out to bell bottoms.  These might be cute if they fit.  But these are not at all workable for my body.  I do like the denim and the color.  I might hang on to these while I'm on my weight loss journey and see if they look better after I drop another 10 pounds.  Follow the size chart to a tee OR order two full sizes over what you normally order.

Let me start off by saying I like these jeans!  The full flare leg is SO cute.  The denim is a nice heavier weight.  Tip: Buy your actual size.  I typically would wear a large but opted for the medium so they wouldn't be too oversized.  I can barely get them over my tummy (which I am currently working on) so I anticipate I wile able to wear them at some point, which in itself is a great motivator since I REALLY like these pants!
The entire zipper came out after wearing only once
They fit true to size, have a great shape and cut to them. They are a little baggy, but not sloppy feeling or looking; just like I wanted! Would DEFINITELY buy again

These jeans are of excellent quality, and fit just right. I love that they are high-waisted. Being that I'm 5'5 and 185 and heavier on the bottom side they fit like the bell bottoms from back in my high school days and pair well with crop tops.

评论概述: Going to Gather-Up the Hem with Snap Buttons~~!!
评论详情: **I’m 5ft4 (longer legs), 26 waist, 35.5in hip and I Ordered Size Small in Purple.** Love these Pants! Back part of waistband is electric. I was “done getting jeans” then these Purple show up…!!?! Ahh!  Since my waist is smaller than the Jeans they sit about1.5in lower down my waist. + Based on Size Chart and Model they are clearly longer than normal pants. 40in is on the ground for me so 42 is long.  I still want them long and the original hem so I don’t want to cut them. Inside the pants (on the front and back) I’m going to put ~each side~ of a snap button 2-3 inches apart so when I put them together it gathers up the fabric, like how the fabric naturally gathers up on top when wearing shoes.

Ordered these jeans for my tall 13 year old daughter. Pictures show bagging or possibly cuffed but that appears to be the model height is short. In fact these are bell bottoms but full leg and not flared. My daughter was thrilled and loves the fit. The elastic part of the waist is a bonus so she can wear them longer. The belt hoop options are nice too because she loves her belts. These took a looooong time to arrive but it was ok.  The color is a dark grayish blue which she liked.  Not for me (mom) but she loves them.
jeans arrived with belt loop torn from the body of the jeans and leaving a hole in the fabric.  They also run about 1 size small. Otherwise look well made.
I was worried i’d be too tall, but they fit like a glove! Super stretchy and cute. I’m 5”9

These jeans are adorable! I had to trim them a bit, and I wear 28|30 jeans, so if you're a 30 or shorter in length then they may be too long. You can always trim it either way. These jeans were mid-low waisted, I have a smaller waist so they were low on me, but depends on your body. I love them soso much and cannot wait to wear them again!

The color in the picture is nothing like the actual product. Black was blue, blue was light blue. It was annoying to constantly keep returning it. The fitting is weird too if you're short like me.
